title: Our client's business idea was to create an unobtrusive and straightforward SaaS product for setting up marketing campaigns.
leftBlock: Initially, our customer, Tal Revivo, approached Onix with a simple short-term task of fixing bugs on a website.
rightBlock: But as the Onix team began to work on Adoric, we learned more about the project, got deeper into the idea of this marketing tool, and, together with the customer, we came to a decision to rebuild the website from scratch.
